```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)


measure_iccs <- read.csv('./measure_iccs.csv')
icc2 <- subset(measure_iccs, type == "ICC2")
icc2 <- icc2 %>% separate(col = measure, into = c("m1", "m2"))
icc2$m1 <- as.integer(icc2$m1)
icc2$m2 <- as.integer(icc2$m2)
long_icc <- icc2[c("ICC", "m1", "m2")]
```
